- I am a first generation college graduate from Appalachian State University.

- I have a bachelors degree in Mathematics and a concentration in Life Sciences.

- I currently work as a director for a non-profit summer camp, Camp Gray Rock, located in Boone, NC. 

- I have a passion for helping youth and hope to someday be a foster parent.

- I enjoy coding in R and love learning new tricks

- In my free time, I love being outside and cuddling with my hairless cat, Milo!
